item.title: Re: Loop Timer
item.content:encoded:
Day 1-Day 14: No penalties
Day 15-Day 29: Can no longer receive Contracts from Missions. Can no longer Spy, Attack or Bingo. Can still take from the Storehouse, but you can no longer give. Can still attack Kaijuu, but gain neither Monster Tickets nor Trophy Damage. Can still fight in the NWW, though I believe your points no longer count towards your village's standing.
Day 30: All of the above penalties, and Daily Stamina, after bonuses, is cut in 1/3.

item.title: Re: Loop Timer

item.title: Re: Loop Timer
item.content:encoded: Two weeks after you receive your looping warning you will be unable to help your Village in the Ninja World War (no bingo'ing, no invading, etc), donate Ryo or Contracts and get tickets toward a monster. You don't have to loop at this point. However, it's probably a good idea.
